text.autoconfig.iotcraft.title: IoTcraft
text.autoconfig.iotcraft.option.mqtt.bro: The URL of the MQTT broker to connect to. Must be without the port at the end.
text.autoconfig.iotcraft.option.mqtt.por: The port of the MQTT broker to connect to. A broker can support multiple ports, in which case it doesn't matter which one you use.
text.autoconfig.iotcraft.option.mqtt.mai: The topic under which the mod will create its subtopics. Can be blank for no main topic.
